titles: By the King, a proclamation for the better ordering of those who repair to the court for their cure of the disease called the Kings-evil
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court of Hampton-Court the fourth day of July 1662, in the fourteenth year of our reign."
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
